scripts.build: if [ "${PWD##*/}" == "build" ]; then cd ../ ; fi && echo $PWD && rsync -av --progress --update "$PWD/node_modules" "$PWD/build" && rsync -av --progress --update --exclude "build" --exclude "node_modules" --exclude "*.yml" --exclude ".*" --exclude "*.js" --exclude "*.md" --exclude "*.log" "$PWD/" "$PWD/build" && babel ./ --ignore "node_modules,build" -d build
scripts.build:start: npm run-script build && cd ./build && NODE_ENV=development node index.js
scripts.start:staging: npm run-script build && cd ./build && NODE_ENV=staging node index.js
scripts.start:production: npm run-script build && cd ./build && NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.test: npm run-script build && cd ./build && NODE_ENV=test mocha
scripts.test-travis: npm run-script build && cd ./build && NODE_ENV=test-travis istanbul cover -x '**_test.js' -x '**/test.js' ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec
